mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat( chat_num, mem_num, doc_num, reg_date, chat_status) VALUES( chat_seq.nextval, mem_num=#{mem_num}, doc_num=#{doc_num}, SYSDATE, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT chat_num, c.mem_num, c.doc_num, c.chat_reg_date, c.chat_status, res_num, r.res_date, r.res_time, m.mem_name FROM chat c JOIN reservation r USING(res_num) JOIN member m ON (c.doc_num = m.mem_num) WHERE c.mem_num=#{mem_num}

SELECT chat_num, c.mem_num, c.doc_num, c.chat_reg_date, c.chat_status, res_num, r.res_date, r.res_time, m.mem_name FROM chat c JOIN reservation r USING(res_num) JOIN member m ON (c.mem_num = m.mem_num) WHERE c.doc_num=#{mem_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_msg(msg_num, chat_num, msg_content, msg_sender_type) VALUES(msg_seq.nextval, #{chat_num}, #{msg_content}, #{msg_sender_type} )

INSERT INTO chat_files (file_num, chat_num, file_name, mem_num, doc_num, file_type, file_valid_date, file_reg_date) VALUES (files_seq.nextval, #{chat_num}, #{file_name}, #{mem_num}, #{doc_num}, #{file_type}, #{file_valid_date}, SYSDATE)
